Monster.Name: Cult Fanatic
Monster.Description: Fanatics are often part of a cultâ€™s leadership, using their charisma and dogma to influence and prey on those of weak will. Most are interested in personal power above all else.

MonsterTrait.Name: Dark Devotion
MonsterTrait.Text: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Dagger
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
